item.title: [FELIX-5789] Webconsole Memory Usage Plugin can cause deadlock
item.description:
When the o.a.f.webconsole.plugins.memoryusage bundle is refreshed it is possible that it causes a deadlock because it has dynamic imports that are only triggered from inside a service factory callback that is synchronized.

That can cause the following deadlock situation:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I fixed it in r1824965 by turning the dynamic imports into optional imports and removing the import on the log packages (and use reflection instead).
